issue_name: Denial of Service Vulnerability in SIMATIC WinCC

1.command: Update to V9.1 SP2 UC04 or later version
1.description: Update SIMATIC PCS 7 V9.1 to V9.1 SP2 UC04 or later version.

2.command: Update to V18 Update 4 or later version
2.description: Update SIMATIC WinCC Runtime Professional V18 to V18 Update 4 or later version.

3.command: Update to V19 Update 1 or later version
3.description: Update SIMATIC WinCC Runtime Professional V19 to V19 Update 1 or later version.

4.command: Update to V7.5 SP2 Update 16 or later version
4.description: Update SIMATIC WinCC V7.5 to V7.5 SP2 Update 16 or later version.

5.command: Update to V8.0 Update 5 or later version
5.description: Update SIMATIC WinCC V8.0 to V8.0 Update 5 or later version.

6.command: Activate SIMATIC Logon in the User Administrator of the SIMATIC PCS 7 Operator Stations
6.description: Activate SIMATIC Logon in the User Administrator to mitigate the issue.
